articles.title: German backpacker found after 11 nights in Australia's outback - BBC
articles.description: Carolina Wilga, 26, survived by drinking from puddles and sleeping in a cave, police said.
articles.content:
A backpacker survived nearly two weeks lost in Western Australia's outback by drinking from puddles and sleeping in a cave, police have said. 
Carolina Wilga, 26, from Germany, was rescued on Friday… [+1539 chars]
